properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 13 at 3:28PM CST until February 15 at 3:16AM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the
following rivers in Middle Tennessee...

Harpeth River At Franklin affecting Williamson County
Harpeth River Below Franklin affecting Williamson County

. Recent rainfall has caused the Harpeth River to rise at both Franklin gage
locations. Both locations will peak this evening into the overnight hours,
then begin to fall Friday morning.

The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Harpeth River Below Franklin
* At 3 PM Thursday the stage was 22.1 feet.
* Action stage is 22.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 27.0 feet.
* At 22.0 feet...Water begins to inundate low lying areas along the banks,
including the nursery at Hillsboro Road and Fulton Green Lane.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
